item.description:
Pick a Holiday Gift Project from those on Display!
PICK A PROJECT NITE
EVERY TUESDAY IN NOVEMBER
November 4, 11, 18, 25
6:30pm - 9:30pm

Projects must be pre-paid and chosen in advance!
Order YOUR Project TODAY:

Christmas Memories Album Project - $47.50

Available Sept.1–Nov.30



Includes:
• 8x8 Jewel Christmas Power™ Palette Kit
• 8x8 Coverset in light blue
• 8x8 White Pages
• 8x8 Page Protectors

Purchase the Coverset, Pages and Power™ Palette Kit and get the Page Protectors for free.

Retail value = $52.50
Bundle price = $47.50
Savings of $5



Estimated Completion Time: 3-4 hours



____________________________________________________________________________________

Christmas Cards & Tags - $52.00


Available Sept. 1-Nov. 30



Includes:
• 8x8 Primary Christmas Power™ Palette Kit
• 12x12 White Cardstock paper pack
• Tag Maker
• Vellum Accents: Expressions of Christmas

Purchase the Power™ Palette Kit, Cardstock paper and Tag Maker and get the Vellum Expressions for free. The Tag Maker will come in handy for future projects!

Retail value = $59.50
Bundle price = $52
Savings of $7.50

Estimated Completion Time: 3-4 hours



______________________________________________________________________________________

Blessings Tree Project - $89.00

Available Aug. 1-Nov. 30



Includes:

• 16x16 Mahogany Page Frame with 12x12 cream mat
• Leaf Maker (Limited Edition)
• Exclusive Tree Art Paper (includes 12x12 paper featuring tree and three sheets of 10x12 paper in Chamois, Poppy and Burnt Sienna)

Purchase the Page Frame and get the Leaf Maker and the Tree Art Paper Pack for FREE.

Retail value = $110.50
Bundle price = $89
Savings of $21.50

Estimated Completion Time: 1 hour


________________________________________________________________________________________

Message Center Project - $50.00

Available Nov. 1, 2008, through February 2009


Project creates a 2009 calendar and includes: 8 x 8 Mini Everyday Display in black with 4 magnets, 2 clothespins and ribbon, Calendar Mats, Calendar Month Title Stickers, Calendar Week Title Stickers and Celebrate Max Kit. SAVE $22

________________________________________________________________________________________

Heritage Album Project - $65.00

Available Nov. 1, 2008, through February 2009


Everything you need to assemble a beautiful heirloom album. Project includes: 12 x 12 PicFolio™ Max Album in chocolate, 12 x 12 Heritage Power™ Palette Kit, 12 x 12 Heritage Paper Pack and a box of 250 medium Photo Corners. SAVE $19.50


Projects can also be ordered
to complete at home or at a workshop!
item.name: Project Nite
